qa.name: Luna
qa.clothing: Flowing robes with intricate cloud patterns

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the realm where dreams touch the sky, a new world takes shape.
json_to_edit.description: Luna and her team construct a magnificent floating city among the clouds.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Gentle wind, distant bird calls, humming of magical energy
json_to_edit.name: Skyborn Citadel
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Luna, the visionary architect, leads her team in building a floating sky city.

qa.action: A vast expanse of sky with floating islands and the beginnings of a grand city structure.

hf.action: Luna stands on a central platform, directing the construction with graceful gestures.

tr.action: Zephyr manipulates air currents to lift building materials into place.

xc.action: Solara's hands work deftly on a control panel, channeling solar power into the city's core.

ka.action: Nimbus shapes clouds into intricate architectural details for the buildings.

fn.action: Camera follows a flock of birds as they weave through the partially constructed spires and bridges.

af.action: Luna's eyes, filled with wonder and determination, reflect the floating city taking shape.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the realm where dreams touch the sky, a new world takes shape.
updated_json.description: Luna and her team construct a magnificent floating city among the clouds.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Gentle wind, distant bird calls, humming of magical energy
updated_json.name: Skyborn Citadel
updated_json.scene_summary: Luna, the visionary architect, leads her team in building a floating sky city.

qa.action: A vast expanse of sky with floating islands and the beginnings of a grand city structure.

hf.action: Luna stands on a central platform, directing the construction with graceful gestures.

xc.action: Solara's hands work deftly on a control panel, channeling solar power into the city's core.

fn.action: Camera follows a flock of birds as they weave through the partially constructed spires and bridges.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, without changing anything else. this means we'll remove shots "tr", "ka", and "af" from the list of shots. we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and remove these shots from the dictionary. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total. all other elements of the json will remain unchanged.
